info.title: Catalog Profile - Read
info.description:
This service enables you to read the details of a catalog profile. Catalog profile is used to determine which catalogs and code groups from the individual catalogs are to be accessed by the system for maintenance notifications.

If the input in the request is not as expected then, the system displays appropriate error or warning messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read catalog profiles using this synchronous inbound service
